channel.title: 2Speced
channel.description:
Well here it is, my remake of 2Speced. My goal for this was to recreate 2Speced and I think I did pretty good.
This server is delta. What makes it so good is the fact that the PVP combat in it is very good.[b] It is the same combat that was in 2Speced![/b]
Other Features: [b]ALL SKILLS WORKING![/b] [b]Awsome Combat[/b] [b]Bosses to kill like ele, kbd, bandos boss.[/b] [b]Minigames - Duel arena/PC/and lots more![/b] [b]Clue scrolls[/b] [b]Shops in Fally[/b] A shit ton more!
Here are just some random pictures, although there are many great things to do on the server.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/5wfssn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/j5xmr5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2crltvn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/etcnqe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2e0uw6d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2zxnq0j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/vfdusi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/6t2tkx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2e2fmf9.png[/img]
I think this is an alright remake of 2Speced. It would've been a lot easier to recreate if I could see like everything on it again but that couldn't happen :P
Credits: Me I vain I for helping me out a lot Dds-specz/Bombs pure Delta ofc
DOWNLOADS:
Client: http://uppit.com/9sqchrtzbsd0/2Speced_Client_1.0.rar
Server: http://uppit.com/xvegz6d8lqoi/2speced_server.rar

item.title: 2Speced
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:27, topic:398995”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=496133.msg3629641#msg3629641 date=1308104729]

I’m a bit new to delta, how would i go about changing this to my no-ip? I can’t find anything in the 2 java files in the client. Theres no 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 yet it connects to localhost?

Search ip in gui.java

Thanks mate, now I can properly test out the PvP systems.
[/quote]

I hope you aint trollin but if your serious, have someone login and fight them in the wildy lol…[/quote]

I’m not trolling, and is there anything wrong with pvp…? I haven’t tryed it yet.

Read full topic
